Hi Marco,

Was good to speak with you.

As discussed, we can add the Zimmerman entities as additional insured to the existing Kuwait and Bahrain local entity policies. The charge will be prorated based on the number of days of cover and based on the negotiated rates. H&C and C&B would pay and recharge the amount to you.

I will not do a full customer creation because the policies will expire in 2 months time. However, I would still need the local commercial license and tax registration documents to add the entities as additional insureds.

Please provide the list stores to be added with the expected opening date.

For the insurance declarations:

I will not do a full customer creation because the policies will expire in 2 months time. However, I would still need the local commercial license and tax registration documents to add the entities as additional insureds.

Please provide the list stores to be added with the expected opening date.

For the insurance declarations:


*	
	Stocks are declared at landed cost
*	
	Furniture/fixtures/equipment at gross value
*	
	For business interruption cover - we need the expected half year Gross Profit for the stores to be insured. Basically budgeted Gross profit for a 6 month period


Once the information is provided, I'll process to additions.

Best Regards,
Hagop
